title: 20. Spilling the Tea on My New Website / Virtual Skin Consulting Business + Instagram Q+A Sesh.
description:
Hi Roomies, I have a big announcement... I have officially launched my business' website and virtual skin consulting services! I would not be here without your encouragement, love and support. You guys truly make me better people, and inspire me to continue pushing forward. 

I am also answering questions y'all submitted through instagram such as:

- How do I stay motivated

- My fav professional product line for esthetician businesses

- What to do when you don't feel like you can help anyone's skin

- How to overcome being discouraged

- My favorite moisturizer

- Supplements for acne

- Class recommendations for advancing your acne knowledge

Things I mentioned in this episode:

Virtual Esthetics Training: https://skincoachjulie.com/join-us-skin-coach-julie

Products mentioned:

Fulvic Elixir 

Intense Peptide Moisturizer

Shop my Glymed Store

MY SOCIAL MEDIA:

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa

Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly 

Tess' TikTok: @myestytessa

Sweet by LiQWYD | https://www.instagram.com/liqwyd

Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com Creative Commons Attribution 3.0

Unported License https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/deed.en_US

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-treatment-room/support
